subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Fans may know Doug Mientkiewicz for catching the last out of the World Series with the Red Sox. But to Mientkiewicz, nothing has mattered as much as his role in turning around the Twins.
snippet: Fans may know Doug Mientkiewicz for catching the last out of the World Series with the Red Sox. But to Mientkiewicz, nothing has mattered as much as his role in turning around the Twins.
